wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Boothroyd Jones (born 11 May 1937) is a Welsh former footballer, who played as a full-back. He made appearances in the English Football League with Wrexham, Crystal Palace and Swindon Town.

response: * Ken Jones (rugby union, born 1921) (1921–2006), Welsh athlete and international rugby union footballer 1950s
